issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description: TestFairScheduler.testReservationMetrics is flaky because of timing issue.

Patch v2 replace {{app.getAppAttemptResourceUsage().getPending();}} with {{app.getPendingDemand()}} since they could return different results in some situation. Make more sense to use later in FS.

This message was automatically generated.
[~yufeigu] - do you want to share any stats from your flakiness tests?
{{app.getAppAttemptResourceUsage().getPending();}} doesn't need update() in FairScheduler to get latest pending demand, but {{app.getPendingDemand()}} does.
[~kasha], after patch, I ran it 200 times and it didn't fail.

+1. Just committed this to trunk and branch-2. 

Thanks for your contribution, Yufei.
[~kasha], thanks for the review and commit.

SUCCESS: Integrated in Jenkins build Hadoop-trunk-Commit #11296 (See [https://builds.apache.org/job/Hadoop-trunk-Commit/11296/])
YARN-6222. TestFairScheduler.testReservationMetrics is flaky. (Yufei Gu (kasha: rev 694e680d20dc07f634b539537021b09d9316601c)
